name: Custom Quote Print for Vows, Song Lyrics, or Memories - Sentimental Christmas Gift
description:
"Memory Lane"
11x17 inches, UNFRAMED

Take your special memories, quotes, wedding vows, or song lyrics and have them designed into this one-of-a-kind print.  ALL text here is YOURS, so there will never be another piece like it.  

Need a unique, sentimental, personalized Christmas gift? Make this one as sappy or silly as you want. The print makes a bold statement on a wall, shelf, or mantle. 

HOW IT WORKS:
Follow these steps at CHECKOUT:

Write in during checkout:
A) Color choice
B) List 10 - 13 memories. Remember to keep them as fairly short phrases. Long phrases may need to occupy two lines. Any text that fits will do (not just memories).
C) If you want to take some time to think about it, just tell me that during checkout. Then get back to me when you are ready via Etsy's on-site email "convo."
D) I will send you a proof within 3 - 5 days (excluding weekends) via Etsy convo.
E) I will ship your print when you are 100% satisfied with what you see.
F) If you'd prefer an 11x14, just state this and include 8-10 lines.
